this_title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond The Lobby Season 1
trans_title: 奇妙酒店：大堂之外的生活 第一季
introduction: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond The Lobby sees Giles Coren and Monica Galetti roll up their sleeves to work alongside staff in some of the most extraordinary hotels across the globe.With wonder, curiosity and humour, they learn tricks of the trade and discover what it takes to offer once-in-a-lifetime experiences in awe-inspiring locations.
chinese_title: 奇妙酒店：大堂之外的生活 第一季
foreign_title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond The Lobby Season 1
